item.title: Simplexpenses - The battle of the frameworks
item.description: After the release of the early Bookmarko version, I started to look around for the next idea that would be interesting to be made and also to help me learn some new developer tools. That’s why my approach was more “Let’s see how this will work” than to make a full working app.
